summary: Robespierrre, a powerful figure in the French revolution, is desperately looking for his black book, a death list of those marked for the guillotine.
cast: Robert Cummings|Richard Basehart|Richard Hart|Arlene Dahl|Arnold Moss|Norman Lloyd|Charles McGraw|Beulah Bondi|Jess Barker|Walter Bacon|Ray Bennett|Chet Brandenburg|Ralph Brooks|William Challee|Frank Conlan|Clancy Cooper|Wade Crosby|Jane Crowley|Mary Currier|Sayre Dearing|John Doucette|Rudy Germane|Charles Gordon|Wilton Graff|Dabbs Greer|Frank Hagney|Oscar 'Dutch' Hendrian|Colin Kenny|Victor Kilian|David Leonard|Ellen Lowe|Frank Mills|Hans Moebus|Boyd 'Red' Morgan|Jack Perry|Fred Rapport|Dan Seymour|Cap Somers|Shepperd Strudwick|Leo Sulky|Anthony Sydes|Russ Tamblyn|Arthur Tovey|Max Wagner|Georgette Windsor
title: El reinado del terror
